description:
The image status mappings need to cover all known Glance image statuses and map them to the following defined in the v1.1 spec: UNKNOWN, ACTIVE, SAVING, ERROR, and DELETED

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/List_Images-d1e4435.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Image Statuses

comments.content:
The image status mapping needs to be updated to match the Glance documentation: http://glance.openstack.org/statuses.html

This is currently blocked on bug 844932
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
